name: Mr. Fish Bizarre Adventure
description: The ocean of Sikeland has always been a home for the fish folks since ages ago. They were living peacefully and in harmony. But one day, piles of trash, oil, and the like made their way into the ocean, killing a lot of fishes in the process. Not all of them died, some of them mutated and some of them survived in the harsh condition of the ocean. Guntur is one of the fish folks in the ocean. One day, he witnessed the death of his parents due to water pollution. Not accepting the way, they died, Guntur went to the land to avenge his parents.
